tokens.resolved_gloss: to shriek (from anguish or danger); by analogy, (as a herald) to announce or convene publicly
tokens.translation: to shriek (from anguish or danger); by analogy, (as a herald) to announce or convene publicly

tokens.resolved_gloss: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative

tokens.resolved_gloss: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
tokens.translation: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)

tokens.resolved_gloss: he will rule as God; Jisraël, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
